channel.title: Cluster on Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Cluster on Thoughts

item.title: Savannah
item.description: Took a trip for work back in December to provide cluster training for some of the engineers at Gulfstream. Seems like we also did some very minor maintenance on the cluster we administer there. Anyway, I brought the camera along and had a chance to take a few pics while wandering around the riverfront. Only got around to pulling them off my camera today, so here they are:
